use_case.title: Modify a participant's role assignments
use_case.description: A Portal Administrator wants to modify a participant's role assignments.

trigger.value: A Portal Administrator wants to modify a participant's role assignments

use_case.basic_path:
1. The Portal Administrator navigates to the "View One Participant" page, using PSRV-00052.
  2. The Administrator is provided with a set of checkboxes for the roles available in the current portal. Boxes for the roles that the participant already possesses are already checked.
  3. The Administrator checks and unchecks boxes to change role assignments.
  4. The Administrator clicks an "Update Role Assignments" button to confirm the changes.
use_case.success_end_conditions: The desired role assignment changes are made.
